tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Other Stages

definition.text: We are inside the Market Sell Order #1 structure of nodes we referenced from the market sell order in the trading system.

paragraphs.text: This is the structure of nodes that keeps track of all the variables associated with that order, remember?
Check the warning in the Rate node!

The slippage configured as a parameter of the trading session was subtracted from the order rate. This resulted in a lower actual rate. All good! The same message appears on the Slippage parameter of the trading session... check it out!
